T02TD2039E:139b-1: de wi dha ra pra bh'a aa dhishth'a na /
T02TD2039E:139b-3: lha mo 'od 'dzin ma'i byin gyis brlab pa bcom ldan 'das gti mug dga' ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2039E:139b-4: ma lus srid pa'i gti mug rnams //
T02TD2039E:139b-5: mthar byed ma la rab btud nas //
T02TD2039E:139b-6: spros med bdud rtsi za ba yi //
T02TD2039E:139b-7: ting nge 'dzin gyis byin brlab bshad //
T02TD2039E:139b-8: mandala la sogs lta gon te //
T02TD2039E:139b-9: bdag bskyed bzlas pa mchod gtor dang //
T02TD2039E:139b-10: 'khor lo tshogs kyis mnyes byas la //
T02TD2039E:139b-11: yon bcas dang pa'i slob ma la //
T02TD2039E:139b-12: sdom pa byin la dam la gzhag / de nas 'dun pa drag po yis //
T02TD2039E:139b-13: bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab //
T02TD2039E:139b-14: padma'i dbus gnas zla ba la //
T02TD2039E:139b-15: aom skyes lha mo mnyam bzhengs dkar //
T02TD2039E:139b-16: chu shel gri gug padma'i snod //
T02TD2039E:139b-17: thugs kar 'dzin pa rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02TD2039E:139b-19: de lta'i gnyis ka gsal byas nas //
T02TD2039E:140a-2: lha mo 'thon te snying gar gzhug / de yi brang dkyil aom skyes pa //
T02TD2039E:140a-3: gri gug aas mtshan thod nang du //
T02TD2039E:140a-4: phyed nub tsam du bsam par bya //
T02TD2039E:140a-5: de yi 'od kyis khams gsum gyi //
T02TD2039E:140a-7: bdag med shes rab dam pa yis //
T02TD2039E:140a-8: sangs rgyas mchod de de rnams kyis //
T02TD2039E:140a-9: stong nyid ye shes bkug la bstim //
T02TD2039E:140a-10: thod pa'i 'od kyis srid gsum gyi //
T02TD2039E:140a-12: zag med bde par gshegs pa mchod //
T02TD2039E:140a-13: mi rtog bde chen ye shes mchog / bkug la gnyis su med par bya //
T02TD2039E:140a-14: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde stong gi / ye shes zung 'jug rmad byung gis //
T02TD2039E:140a-15: bdud rtsis lus gang brtan g-yo yi //
T02TD2039E:140a-16: bcud bsdus ngo bor bsam byas la //
T02TD2039E:140a-17: bla ma'i ting 'dzin nus pas dbab //
T02TD2039E:140a-18: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD2039E:140a-19: aa mo ha ra ti a'a gatstsha ya a'a gatstsha ya h'um h'um dza dza dza ya /
T02TD2039E:140a-28: 'phar dang g-ya' dang dgod pa dang //
T02TD2039E:140a-29: bde stong nyams ni skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2039E:140a-30: ji srid bran du khas blangs nas //
T02TD2039E:140a-31: yon phul mnyes pas dam tshig bzhin //
T02TD2039E:140a-32: bla ma bsten la brtson par bya //
T02TD2039E:140a-33: bla ma blo mi bde ba yi //
T02TD2039E:140a-34: slob ma'i dngos grub 'dod pa ni //
T02TD2039E:140a-35: chur shes smig rgyu ji bzhin no //
T02TD2039E:140a-36: ting nge 'dzin gyi bcud len gyi byin rlabs grub thob kyi bdag po mkhas pa chen po dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2039E:140a-38: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba a'a ka ra dang /
T02TD2039E:140a-39: lo ts'a ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba las /
T02TD2039E:140a-40: dus phyis rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta darba na a'a ts'arya dang lo ts'a ba dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa zhe sdang rdo rjes bsgyur cing zhus te slar dag par byas so //
T02TD2039E:140a-41: snga 'gyur la 'di bas tshan che tsam gda'o gsung ngo//
